welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Irlam, a charming city nestled in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its rich history and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal, primarily used by low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal, primarily used for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport caters to seasonal and holiday flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'LJLA Free WiFi' network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
